DOC.brief_summary: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis ( ALS ) progressive neurological disorder characterize amongst others asymmetric muscle weakness , respiratory insufficiency spasticity . The disease usually fatal within 2-3 year cure . ALS patient usually support multidisciplinary team . One member team physical therapist . The aim physical therapy might enhance preserve cardiovascular fitness muscle strength . Some author suggest , however , moderate high intensive exercise programme might lead overuse weakness ( undesired fast progression muscle weakness ) . The primary objective study therefore investigate whether regular moderate high intensity exercise program ALS maintain optimize cardiorespiratory fitness muscle strength . A secondary objective investigate whether programme lead overuse weakness positive influence patient 's disability , fatigue quality life .
